name: Hero Kitty
description: Hero Kitty is a platformer adventure game embedded in a dark, falling apart world of boundaries and borders. The nature of this town is rough and full of rebel signs, far from an essence of everyday life. As a player, You have to destroy what is left of the walls, which are dividing the place with your friends and others into sad and lonely spots. Player has a powerful ball to throw at the cracks in the walls, which weakens and destroys them. To strike the crack, it requires targeting a suitable spot on the ground for getting the right trajectory. Also the player has to be warefull of the dangerous rubble falling down. As the walls are destroyed, imprisoned creatures are finally free and ready to enter their town with no borders.
